### Technical Lead, Senior Software Developer & Mobile Software Architect.



Welcome to my GitHub profile! I'm a **Flutter Developer** with 6+ years of experience in building mobile applications. I specialize in **Flutter, Android (Java/Kotlin), Payment Gateway Integration, Live Tracking, and more.**
